What are Nishma Gurung's main specialties?

Nishma Gurung is a podiatrist and pediatric podiatrist. She offers: follow-up podiatry visits, initial podiatry consultation, gait analysis, chiropody, pediatric podiatry, sports insoles + biomechanical study, nail reconstruction, and initial pediatric podiatry consultation.
Where is Nishma Gurung's clinic located?
Nishma Gurung attends at Carrer de Carreras i Candi 44, local 1, Barcelona.
Can I have an online consultation with Nishma Gurung without having to travel to her clinic?
No, at the moment Nishma Gurung does not offer online consultations.
How is payment made to Nishma Gurung after the visit?
She accepts the following payment methods: cash and credit card.
What languages does Nishma Gurung speak?
She speaks Catalan, Spanish, English, and Hindi.
How can I book an appointment with Nishma Gurung?
The calendar on Doctoralia is updated in real-time. You just need to choose a day and time from the available options. Booking is free and includes a reminder before the visit.
When could I visit Nishma Gurung?

Sometimes she has availability within the same week or the next. The calendar is in real-time and shows the first available time. If it doesn't suit you, check other days. Booking is immediate and free.
What do patients think of Nishma Gurung?
A total of 46 patients have left a review, with an average rating of 5 out of 5 stars.
What insurance companies does Nishma Gurung accept?
She does not accept insurance companies, only private patients. If in doubt, contact the specialist directly.
